title: The Game Awards Official Predictions - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Go to http://amazon.com/gameawards to discover and shop the nominees of The Game Awards all in one place.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get 50% off two or more pairs.

Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unnecessary subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Go to http://go.factor75.com/kindafunny60 and use code kindafunny60 to get 60% off your first box.

Tim, Greg, Blessing, and Andy discuss what they hope will be at The Game Awards 2022, including Metal Gear Solid Remake, a new 2D Super Mario, Kojima announcements, and more!

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
